#include <algorithm>
#include <cassert>
#include <cmath>
#include <cstdio>
#include <cstdlib>
#include <cstring>
#include <deque>
#include <iomanip>
#include <iostream>
#include <map>
#include <queue>
#include <set>
#include <stack>
#include <string>
#include <vector>

using namespace std;

#define sd(x) scanf("%d",&x)
#define sfd(x) scanf("%d",&x)
#define sfld(x) scanf("%lld",&x
#define pf printf

#define LL long long
#define ll long long
#define LD long double
#define ld long double
#define PB push_back
#define pb push_back
#define MP make_pair
#define mp make_pair
#define F first
#define S second

#define pii pair<int,int>
#define vi vector<int>
#define fr(i,n) for( int i=0; i<=n; i++)
#define frm(i,m,n) for(int i=m; i<=n; i++)
#define N 200000

vector<int> primes(100);

int arr[1010];


void seive(){

    memset(arr,0,sizeof(arr));

    arr[0] = 1;
    arr[1] = 1;

    int count=0;

    for(int i=2;i<1010;i++){

        if(arr[i]==0){

            if(i>=29 && arr[i]==0) primes[count++] = i;

            for(int j = i*i;j<1010;j+=i){


                arr[j] = 1;
            }
        }
    }

    for(int i=29;i<1010;i++){

        //if(arr[i]==0) primes.push_back
    }





}


int main(){

    seive();

    //for(int i=0;i<100;i++) cout<<primes[i]<<" ";
    int t;
    cin>>t;

    while(t--){

        int n;
        cin>>n;

        ll sum = 0;

        for(int i=0;primes[i]<=n;i++){

            sum+=primes[i];
        }

        cout<<sum<<"\n";
    }
}
